name: ZeroRanger
notes: Download demo from itch.io before proceeding. https://system-erasure.itch.io/zerorangerdemo

files.demozip: N/A:Select zip archive downloaded from itch.io

content:
files:
- demozip: N/A:Select zip archive downloaded from itch.io
- dxsetup: https://lutris.net/files/tools/directx-2010.tar.gz
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/ZeroRanger/ZeroRangerDEMO.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    command: mkdir "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/ZeroRanger"
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: $demozip
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /C /T:"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\ZeroRanger"
    executable: $CACHE/ZeroRangerDEMO.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/ZeroRanger
    src: $CACHE/readme.txt
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/dxsetup
    file: $dxsetup
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    executable: $CACHE/dxsetup/DXSETUP.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  version: staging-3.16-x86_64
